tasks.task: Understanding the historical and modern roles of dogs in agriculture.
subtasks: Recognize the evolutionary relationship between dogs and humans dating back thousands of years.
Identify initial roles of dogs in hunting and gathering.
Understand the transformation of dogs' roles with societal settling into agriculture.
Describe the emergence and functions of herding breeds, such as border collies.
Explain the purpose and characteristics of terriers, including their role in pest control.
Discuss the role of guardian dogs in protecting livestock from predators.
Acknowledge the importance of the bond between farmers and dogs in increasing productivity.
Recognize the continued relevance and adaptation of working dogs in modern farming.
